name: Blue Iris Video
summary: Learn about .BVR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BVR files are saved in a proprietary format and can only be played with Blue Iris video security and Webcam software.

description: Video file recorded by Blue Iris security video recording software; often used in stores, malls, and other commercial sites; allows video to be played back and scrolled based on motion events (e.g., a customer walking by) captured in the video.
